title: Creamy Ramp And Barley Soup
summary: Creamy Ramp And Barley Soup might be just the soup you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 155 calories, 8g of protein, and 2g of fat each. For $2.4 per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Only a few people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. Head to the store and pick up barley, chicken stock, coarse salt and ground pepper, and a few other things to make it today. Autumn will be even more special with this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 69%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Orange-glazed Carrots with Ramp Barley and Spinach, Creamy Rutabaga & Barley Soup, and Creamy Lentil, Barley and Mushroom Soup.
